entry.title: Bluff
entry.summary:
Author: verydemure

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,827Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 114

Summary: Derek is desperate, his family on the brink of ruin. Ordered by the council to marry before the end of the year, everyone assumes he'll just marry some rich woman and get to creating an heir.They're wrong.-Mischief.Derek thinks that's what Stiles' full Polish name means. It's all he sees as Stiles says, “You know. I think I was wrong on both accounts." Before Derek can respond, Stiles continues, “Will you ask again? Properly.” Stiles glances to the side of the table. To the floor.It's a test.Derek takes his dead mother's ring. Gets down on one knee in front of Stiles, who generously makes room between his legs.“Will you marry me?”“Yes.”
